Enum ValueConverter.NumberFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ValueConverter.NumberFormat>
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.ValueConverter.NumberFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ValueConverter.NumberFormat>
    Enclosing class:
    ValueConverter

    public static enum ValueConverter.NumberFormat
extends java.lang.Enum<ValueConverter.NumberFormat>
    Describes the format in which numbers are shown in the GUI.
    Since:
    2009.a
